keyword: how many calories are in a dum dum
title: How Many Calories Are in a Dum Dum?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a dum dum lollipop, including carbs, sugars, and other nutrition facts for this classic candy treat.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Dum Dum?
assumptions: Standard Dum Dum lollipop (cherry or similar flavor), about 7g total weight, no stick included in nutrition.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand batch, and size; check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A single Dum Dum lollipop contains about 25 calories, primarily from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a Dum Dum lollipop?
faqs.a: About 25 calories per standard Dum Dum.

faqs.q: Are Dum Dums high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, one Dum Dum has around 6.2 g of sugars, making up most of its carbs.

faqs.q: Do Dum Dums have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: No significant protein or fatâ€”0 g for both in a standard lollipop.

faqs.q: How does flavor affect calories in a Dum Dum?
faqs.a: Minimal variation; most flavors are around 25 kcal, but check labels for specifics.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in a Dum Dum?
faqs.a: Typically 0 mg, as it's a simple hard candy.
